item.title: Swiss Political System: More than You ever Wanted to Know (I.)
item.description: Swiss political system may be best known for its extensive use of referenda. However, others may argue that its most striking feature is the ability to avoid political polarization. In this respect it may be unique among the western nations.

item.title: Understanding F# applicatives and custom operators
item.description:
After discussing something with Ian Russell he suggested I take some time to read through another fine blog post he has written and understand F# applicatives and custom operators. I found myself in familiar territory when reading F# blog posts and itâ€™s something similar to the five stages of grief. Nod, Nod, I understand whatâ€™s going on, Umm, WTF is going on. As Ian did in his Intro to F# series he sets out a simple domain problem and goes about how to address it. We want to return a ValidatedUser from a function but if the user fails validation we return a list of validation errors.
The code in the blog post was pretty self explanatory until, it wasnâ€™t, which I have pasted below:

item.title: Krita, OpenGL and Qt â€“ Fading Memories
item.description: Adrian Page first coded an OpenGL-based canvas implementation for Krita in 2005. That was back in the Qt3 days. OpenGL was fairly simple back then, but we had to duplicate all our canvas handling code, once implemented in OpenGL, once implemented with QPainter.

item.title: Powerful AI Can Now Be Trained on a Single Computer - IEEE Spectrum
item.description: The enormous computing resources required to train state-of-the-art artificial intelligence systemsÂ means well-heeled tech firms are leaving academic teams in the dust. But a new approach could help balance the scales, allowing scientists to tackle cutting-edge AI problems on a single computer.
item.author: (By Edd Gent)

item.title: Automatic Garage Opener
item.description: Come and go with easy access. Connect your Model 3/Model Y to your garage door, gate system and other radio-frequency (RF) controlled devices with the fully integrated Homelink module. Learn more about the Automatic Garage Opener on our support page. This Automatic Garage Opener Upgrade is compatible with all Model 3/Model Y cars. Price includes installation. Parts will be sent directly to the customer shipping address. Schedule your service appointment through Tesla App upon receipt of the product (Accessories > Upgrades & Installations). Do not tamper with the package or installation will be voided.Â When scheduling, please include your order# in the appointment description.
